duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead clients through strategic communications initiatives from concept to completion and results.
Develop strategic messaging for clients, and lead the creation of media relations plans and proposals.
Generate story ideas and topical angles, drafting media materials, and pitching editors, journalists, and producers to earn client coverage.
Leverage influencers to impact clients, their brands, and their storytelling goals.
Provide thoughtful recommendations for content creation and distribution across multiple channels to support paid, owned and earned channels.
Participate in office-wide initiatives, industry events, and meetings to further professional learning and intellectual capital.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Journalism, Public Relations, Communications, Marketing, or English (Master's preferred)
